name: Ras
greetingText: I know it's been a while since things ended between us
wishText: I value the connection we shared and believe I can be a better partner for you now. ;)
text1: I respect your space and time to process everything.
textInChatBox: I haven't been able to stop thinking about our time together, I wanted to reach out honestly. blah blah...
text2: That's what I was going to do.
text4: I realised, I wanted to do something
wishHeading: Hope we can work this out!
outroText: I understand if things aren't the same or if you've moved on, and I completely respect that. But if there's even a small part of you that remembers the good times we had and feels open to it, I'd love to catch up and see where things stand. No pressure at all, just an honest offer
replayText: Click here, if you want to watch it again.
